government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to abandon the proposals as set out by the Ministry of Justice in their recent consultation ‘Legal aid: refocusing on priority cases’ (reference CP12/09). The proposals mean that access to justice for the most vulnerable in society and their access to the courts would be severely curtailed. The proposals threaten to restrict the ability of ordinary people to use the courts to hold the state to account and undermine the rule of law.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=MOJConsultation


Her Majesty's Government
